title: Booming Brands Volume 1
author: Harsh Pamnani
summary: Features the journeys of eleven ‘Made in India’ brands, including Su-Kam and its visionary founder Kunwer Sachdev.

title: Connect The Dots
author: Rashmi Bansal
summary: Highlights 20 Indian entrepreneurs without MBAs, including the Su-Kam story of Kunwer Sachdev.

title: Making Breakthrough Innovation Happen
author: Porus Munshi
summary: Covers 11 breakthrough innovations in India, including Su-Kam’s disruptive inverter innovation led by Kunwer Sachdev.
